Question
========

Inferential statistics is about

Answerlist
----------

* Making a decision about one or more populations based on one or more samples.
* Make a decision about one or more samples based on one or more populations.
* Make a decision about one or more samples assuming one or more populations are well sampled.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Make a decision about one or more populations based on one or more samples...: Correct
* Make a decision about one or more samples based on one or more populations...: Incorrect
* Make a decision about one or more samples assuming one or more populations are well sampled...: Incorrect
